name: Swing (itch) (Zhenyi)
description:
Mechanic

Hook Point – Hooking point is placed in the map to enable player to grapple.

Player action: Activate grappling hook. When player input Hook – H action in a certain range around the hook point, the player character hangs on the hook point with a grappling hook, during the suspension, L and R moves will swing the player to left or right.

Actions when hanging: L – swing left; R – swing right; J – Vertical Jump; L + J - left swing jump

R+J – right swing jump; Climb Up/Down

Grappling Hook Spec: Max length 2m, Min length 1m, Max Angle 120°

Players can jump one more time after they leave the hook.

Controls： 

WASD Move 

Space Jump 

R / J  Using the hook 

Game Assets: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
